snippet.title: Soda Dungeon 2 Teaser
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/946050/Soda_Dungeon_2/
Drink soda, raid dungeons, upgrade your town and tavern, and try to steer clear of the Dark Lord. In Soda Dungeon 2 you’ll find everything you loved about the original Soda Dungeon but with new features like Soda Script for customizing your party’s auto-combat behavior and crafting (naturally) Not to mention new enemies, items, dungeons, and more! 

To follow along with development check out our social accounts:

Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/SodaDungeon
Developer Twitter: https://twitter.com/anpShawn
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/sodadungeon
